text: Madhya Bharat Sports Club is an Indian semi-professional football club based in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, who plays in I-League 2nd Division. ==History== Madhya Bharat Sports Club was founded in 2017 in collaboration with Celtic F.C. Academy. On 21 February 2018, All India Football Federation announced that Madhya Bharat will participate in 2017–18 I-League 2nd Division. On 21 August 2018, All India Football Federation announced that Madhya Bharat will participate in 2018–19 I-League 2and Division. ==Kit manufacturers and shirt sponsors== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;margin- left:1em;float:center" |- !Period !Kit manufacturer !Shirt sponsor |- |2018 |rowspan=2|Cosco |AMG |- |2018—present |D B Corp Ltd. |- |} ==Current Squad== ==Staffs== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left" |- |- !
